others: Proficient in crafting dynamic applications using JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React, Redux and TypeScript.
Driven by challenges, passionate about problem-solving and take pride in crafting prototypes, continuously pushing boundaries, and embracing learning opportunities.
Adept at performance optimisation, debugging, and benchmarking.
Skilled in crafting performant and reusable UI code, ensuring comprehensive testing across platforms and devices.
Excellent written and interpersonal skills develop through presentation on products.
Strong knowledge in 2D and 3D animation, graphic processing and video editing software.
Familiarity with SVG Manipulation, GLSL/WebGL and DOM animations.
